item.title: First steps in Salt, and Salt vs. Chef
item.description: Credits First off, I want to thank my friend Wes Whetstone for giving me feedback on this post before I published it. He told me I was holding it (Salt) wrong and to stop trying to make Salt like Chef hehe! I’m mostly kidding: he was very respectful in his criticism and he encouraged me to rewrite the code using custom state modules and custom execution modules to make it more properly Salt-y.
